column1: Support: My supported ally and I can't take damage or die this round. Copy the last spell you cast on only me this round onto that ally (It can't be copied again).

"Why should Taric show his fellow man kindness? Well, he came to Targon a broken man, intent on climbing the mountain to atone for his sins... and he succeeded. Nobody knows better that all broken things can be made beautiful again." - Mountain Scryer
